actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs, under certain conditions, to transfer individuals, entitled as former members of the Armed Forces to medical care, to institutions which furnish nursing care.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs, under specified conditions, to transfer individuals, entitled as former members of the Armed Forces to medical care, to institutions which furnish nursing care. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 620(a) (2))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs, under certain conditions, to transfer individuals, entitled as former members of the Armed Forces to medical care, to institutions which furnish nursing care.
